title: Everything in Life
text: Everything in Life is a 1936 British <a href="musical%20film">musical film</a> directed by <a href="J.%20Elder%20Wills">J. Elder Wills</a> and starring <a href="Gitta%20Alpar">Gitta Alpar</a>, <a href="Neil%20Hamilton%20%28actor%29">Neil Hamilton</a> and <a href="Lawrence%20Grossmith">Lawrence Grossmith</a>. It was made at <a href="Highbury%20Studios">Highbury Studios</a>. An <a href="opera">opera</a> singer pretends to be poor in order to romantically win over a <a href="composer">composer</a>.
